title: I want to be a singer, but what if I do not get popular? How should I start my music career? - Quora

response.answer_text: First of all make a clear picture, of what u exactly want. Yes u can be a very good or even great singer👍 But no one can bet you'll b a popular singer! So decide first if u want to be a singer OR u just want to get POPULAR!! I've some good friends who are amazing singers n doing good in music industry, But unfortunately they ain't as popular. Wishes 👍
